moves.name: Vice Grip
moves.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Vital Throw
moves.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

moves.name: Submission
moves.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

moves.name: Storm Throw
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Superpower
moves.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.
